{"id":1122289658,"question_id":694,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1702876378,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"19 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1122289658/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Number of Distinct Islands","memory":"44.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int numDistinctIslands(int[][] grid) {\n        int h = grid.length;\n        int w = grid[0].length;\n\n        boolean[][] seen = new boolean[h][w];\n\n        Queue<int[]> q = new LinkedList<>();\n\n        Set<String> set = new HashSet<>();\n        int cnt = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<h; i++){\n            for(int j=0; j<w; j++){\n                if(grid[i][j]==1 && seen[i][j]==false) {\n                    List<String> list = new ArrayList<>();\n                    dfs(grid, i, j, seen, list);\n                    set.add(list+\"\");\n                    cnt++;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        return set.size();\n    }\n\n    int[][] dirs = new int[][]{{0,1}, {1,0}, {-1,0},{0,-1}};\n\n    private void dfs(int[][] grid, int i, int j, boolean[][] seen, List<String> list){\n        int h = grid.length;\n        int w = grid[0].length;\n\n\n        list.add(\"0_0\");\n\n        Queue<int[]> q = new LinkedList<>();\n        q.offer(new int[]{i, j});\n        seen[i][j] = true;\n\n\n        \n        while(!q.isEmpty()){\n            int[] p = q.poll();\n\n            for(int[] d : dirs){\n                int r = d[0]+p[0];\n                int c = d[1]+p[1];\n\n                if(r<0 || c<0 || r>=h || c>=w || seen[r][c] || grid[r][c]==0)\n                    continue;\n                \n                list.add((r-i) + \"_\" + (c-j));\n                seen[r][c] = true;\n                q.offer(new int[]{r,c});\n            }\n        }\n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"number-of-distinct-islands","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
